backend/main.mo: Main actor entry point that traps on startPollRequest to prevent polling calls in the main.loop actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three design refinement features: color palette/shadows, spacing/typography hierarchy, and micro-interactions/animations across frontend components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration with details on routing, authentication, styling, and real-time data synchronization.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with CSS custom properties defining OKLCH color system for light and dark themes, including sidebar, chart, and UI component color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the AegisLand application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with six routes (home, search, dashboard, property details, transfer, register), theme provider, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Application footer with three-column grid layout featuring app description, quick links, social icons, copyright notice, and Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with logo, nav links, theme toggle, Internet Identity authentication dropdown, and mobile sheet menu with smooth transitions and backdrop blur.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper component that renders Header, main content area with Outlet for nested routes, and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages backend actor instances based on Internet Identity authentication state, with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for land registry operations including fetching land records, searching properties, and registering parcels with optimistic updates and real-time synchronization (backend calls currently stubbed).
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme color systems using OKLCH color space, plus shimmer animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: User dashboard displaying authenticated user's land records, pending transfers, and recent activity with loading states and authentication guards (currently using mock data).
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showcasing the blockchain land registry system with hero section, feature cards highlighting security and automation capabilities, and call-to-action buttons.
frontend/src/pages/PropertyDetailsPage.t: Displays detailed information about a specific land parcel including ownership history, documents, and blockchain verification status. Uses mock data as fallback and includes loading states with skeleton UI.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Provides a form for authenticated users to register new land parcels on the blockchain with fields for parcel ID, coordinates, area, and land use. Shows success confirmation after registration.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Implements a search interface for finding land parcels by ID, location, or owner with a grid display of results. Uses mock data as fallback and includes loading states.
frontend/src/pages/TransferPage.tsx: Handles property ownership transfer for authenticated users by accepting a new owner's principal ID. Shows success confirmation and redirects to dashboard after transfer completion.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended border radius, box shadows, and includes typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a government-grade blockchain land registry system built on Internet Computer Protocol with multi-canister architecture (LandRegistry, Identity, Payment, DocumentVerification). Contains architectural notes, existing features for React Query hooks, UI refinements, real-time synchronization, and refined design system implementation with subtle gradients and elevated depth.
